name: Floe (The Tub)
description:
Pull yourself into the abyss of the rogue moon Charybdis on a survey of its darkest depths.

Some planned features are absent from the game due to time constraints. Regardless, we hope you enjoy it!

CONTROLS

F4: Fullscreen

WASD: Move

Left mouse: Melee attack + rock breaker

Hold right mouse: Aim harpoon

Hold left mouse (while aiming): Fire harpoon
